scripts.cypress: npm run cypress:component && npm run cypress:e2e
scripts.lint: eslint $(for appdir in $(ls apps); do if ! $(git check-ignore -q "apps/$appdir"); then printf "apps/$appdir "; fi; done) core --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern
scripts.sass: sass --style compressed --load-path core/css core/css/ $(for cssdir in $(find apps -mindepth 2 -maxdepth 2 -name "css"); do if ! $(git check-ignore -q $cssdir); then printf "$cssdir "; fi; done)
scripts.sass:watch: sass --watch --load-path core/css core/css/ $(for cssdir in $(find apps -mindepth 2 -maxdepth 2 -name "css"); do if ! $(git check-ignore -q $cssdir); then printf "$cssdir "; fi; done)
scripts.stylelint: stylelint $(for appdir in $(ls apps); do if ! $(git check-ignore -q "apps/$appdir"); then printf "'apps/$appdir/**/*.{scss,vue}' "; fi; done) 'core/**/*.{scss,vue}'
